scripts.deps: find parcellab -type d -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 | xargs -I {} helm dependency update {}
scripts.lint: npm run lint:helm && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:helm: npm run deps && find parcellab -type d -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 | xargs -I {} helm lint {}
scripts.template: find parcellab -type d -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -not -path parcellab/common | xargs -I {} helm template {}
scripts.test:cronjob: helm dependency update parcellab/cronjob && helm lint parcellab/cronjob && helm template parcellab/cronjob
scripts.test:microservice: helm dependency update parcellab/microservice && helm lint parcellab/microservice && helm template parcellab/microservice
scripts.test:monolith: helm dependency update parcellab/monolith && helm lint parcellab/monolith && helm template parcellab/monolith
scripts.test:worker-group: helm dependency update parcellab/worker-group && helm lint parcellab/worker-group && helm template parcellab/worker-group
scripts.test: npm run test:common && npm run test:cronjob && npm run test:microservice && npm run test:monolith && npm run test:worker-group
